user_query: I am organizing a charity event to support education. I need to provide some interesting trivia facts about numbers during the event. Can you give me a random number fact? Additionally, I would like to include inspirational quotes about education. Please provide me with some famous quotes.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random trivia fact about numbers to be used in the charity event.
Retrieve famous inspirational quotes about education to include in the event materials.
